# Mercenary (Trait)
## Overview
**Mercenary**: For everything there is a price, and you are a negotiator at heart. You gain a +2 trait bonus on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]], [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]], and [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] checks made while negotiating payment for a quest or a service that you provide. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 60
